title: Limited Project Visibility
description:
Lack of real-time progress tracking, causing delays in meeting project timelines and staying within budget. 
Solution: The comprehensive Project Manager Dashboard and escalation system allow for better visibility and timely alerts for Managers and Stakeholders.

title: Redundant Data Entry
description:
Teams struggle with repeated data entry, often using Excel or spreadsheets, leading to inefficiency. 
Solution: The system eliminates redundant data entry by capturing task data through Self, Manager, and sprint task modules, ensuring streamlined workflow.

title: Unclear Role Assignments
description:
Poor role-based task allocation leads to confusion and low productivity. 
Solution: The system ensures clear role-based task visualization from the planning stage to execution, reducing confusion and improving efficiency.

title: No Employee Drill-Down View
description:
Managers find it hard to track individual employee contributions. 
Solution: Managers can drill down into employee performance using dashboards and detailed reports, improving task allocation and performance monitoring.

title: Cumbersome Approval Process
description:
Rigid, delayed, and complex approval processes slow down decision-making. 
Solution: Simplifies the approval process through integration with cloud, mobile apps, email and even WhatsApp, making approvals more seamless.

title: Absence of Cost Tracking
description:
Lack of visibility into the projectâ€™s budget and costing. 
Solution: Provides in-depth cost tracking through the Project Manager Dashboard, ensuring projects stay within budget from the start to the end.

title: Lack of Real-Time Tracking
description:
Difficulty tracking work hours and task statuses (backlogs, to-dos, and completed tasks). 
Solution: Real-time task status updates and scrum meetings provide Managers with up-to-date visibility, allowing them to make adjustments as needed.

title: Inefficient Task Rescheduling
description:
Bottlenecks and unfinished tasks are hard to identify and resolve. 
Solution: Helps managers track task dependencies and reschedule efficiently, preventing delays and ensuring smooth project execution.

title: Onsite Activity with Limited Connectivity
description:
Onsite activities are often difficult to track due to poor connectivity. 
Solution: Integrates features like voice recognition, image uploads, and camera capture, making it easier to manage onsite activities, even with limited connectivity.
